players.name: Alice
memory: You: "We need to figure out who killed Bob. I think we should share any information we have and discuss who seems suspicious."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice, we should discuss any information we have that might help us identify the culprit. I haven't noticed anything out of the ordinary."
Charlie: "Based on what we've shared so far, it seems like we don't have any concrete information to go on. Let's keep an open mind and continue discussing anything that might be relevant."
Diana: "I believe we should keep our focus on the suspicious behavior we've observed. Alice, your deception during the investigation night raises some red flags for me."
You: "Diana, I'm not sure what you mean by 'deception during investigation night' - we haven't shared any investigation results yet. That accusation seems baseless and makes me suspicious of you."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
